entries: You have five specialties: hefting barrels, drinking, polishing steins, drinking, and drinking. You worked in a bar, where you learned how to hold your liquor and rowdily socialize.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Diplomacy} skill and the {@skill Lore||Alcohol Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Hobnobber} skill feat.
